name: FlappyBird3D (naLTheDuck)
description: FlappyBird3D is a game made by a Vietnamese student-developer for learning Unity, which is a 3D replica of the original Flappy Bird. In this game, all you have to do is press space or mouse click to get the bird to go through as much pipe as you can. If you want to change perspective, use the C key. Why? Because C is for the camera!
